messages.model_failed_load: Model failed to load. Try downloading again.
messages.language_mismatch_hint: Pasted text seems to be in a different language than selected. Results might be suboptimal.
messages.language_mismatch_description: We detected {{detected}}, but you have {{selected}} selected. Model results are better when languages match.
messages.confirm_remove_model: Remove this model from local disk?
messages.confirm_clear_cache: This will delete ALL downloaded models. Continue?

popup.privacy_description: No data leaves your device. Everything runs locally in your browser.

error.could_not_parse: Could not clarify the model output format.
error.unparseable_output_detail: The selected model returned an invalid format. This often happens with smaller models or specific styles. Please try selecting a different model from the list.

descriptions.gemma-2-9b-it-q4f16_1-MLC: Best for complex rewrites, deep stylistic changes, and paragraph restructuring.
descriptions.Llama-3.1-8B-Instruct-q4f16_1-MLC: Excellent for polishing professional reports and business correspondence.
descriptions.Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct-q4f16_1-MLC: The specialist for multilingual grammar and technical documentation.
descriptions.Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.3-q4f16_1-MLC: European language specialist. Efficient and highly capable.
descriptions.Phi-3.5-mini-instruct-q4f16_1-MLC: High logic density; great for improving argument flow and structure.
descriptions.Qwen2.5-3B-Instruct-q4f16_1-MLC: Balanced choice for fixing errors while preserving your original meaning.
descriptions.Llama-3.2-3B-Instruct-q4f16_1-MLC: Perfect for quick daily grammar fixes and polishing chat messages.
descriptions.gemma-2-2b-it-q4f16_1-MLC: Lightweight and creative; ideal for simple sentence rewrites.
descriptions.Qwen2.5-1.5B-Instruct-q4f16_1-MLC: Instantaneous checks for typos and basic punctuation errors.
